InstructionData.Title: DISH
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias Dish d0 alias VDial d1 alias HDial d2 alias Auto d3
alias hangle r0 alias vangle r1 alias statex r2 alias temp1 r13
define HSTEP 4
init: div temp1 360 5 s HDial Mode temp1 div temp1 90 5 s VDial Mode temp1
move vangle 45 l hangle Dish Horizontal s Dish Vertical vangle
start: l statex Auto Setting beq statex 0 manual beq statex 1 startsweep yield j start
startsweep: #move hangle 0 sweep: s Dish Horizontal hangle s db Setting hangle mod temp1 hangle 360 div temp1 hangle 5 trunc temp1 temp1 s HDial Setting temp1
l temp1 VDial Setting mul vangle 5 temp1 s Dish Vertical vangle
l statex Auto Setting beq statex 0 manual add hangle hangle HSTEP bge hangle 360 sweepdone yield j sweep sweepdone: #s Auto Open 0 rand vangle mul vangle vangle 90 div vangle vangle 5 trunc vangle vangle mul vangle vangle 5 s Dish Vertical vangle div temp1 vangle 5 trunc temp1 temp1 s VDial Setting temp1 move hangle 0 s HDial Setting 0 j startsweep
manual: l temp1 HDial Setting mul hangle temp1 5 s Dish Horizontal hangle
l temp1 VDial Setting mul vangle temp1 5 s Dish Vertical vangle l statex Auto Setting beq statex 1 startsweep yield j manual
